title: [CLIENT] Star Guardian Skins missing for the Gifting Center
body:
I wanted to buy Star Guardian Poppy for a friend of mine but I can't seem to find it in the gifting center. Searching for guardian skins using the search box I could only find Star Guardian Jinx and Star Guardian Lux. I don't know if this is the right place to write this report, but I am really looking forward to having this issue fixed.

Edit : Screenshot
Edit 2: Turns out my friend already had the skins bought so that would be the reason they did not show up.
http://i43.photobucket.com/albums/e385/zambiru/league_2.jpg

replies.body: Hmm. This is interesting. As you've said, your friend already owns Poppy. Is it possible they've already unlocked SG Poppy on their own? It wouldn't show up if they already own the skin.
Yes, turns out my friend had bought the skins just a few minutes after they got released. That would be the reason why they didn't show up.
Ahh, gotcha. Appreciate the follow up. :)
Yes, she does. I checked if i can buy it for myself, and i can. But if i want to send it as a gift, i can't find it in the list.
I searched guardian to gift a friend the Jinx skin, all that showed was a Skarner skin. interesting
I wanted to gift a friend Star guardian jinx too and it wouldn't show up. He owns jinx but not the star skin. It only showed lux, janna, and poppy to gift. Definitely something going on.
